text: Richard John Priestman is an archer from Great Britain. He was born on 16 July 1955. Priestman competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics, 1988 Summer Olympics, and the 1992 Summer Olympics.Richard PriestmanRichard John PRIESTMAN == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:British archers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Great Britain
title: Richard Priestman
